comment._content: See next photo for more tram and date information: www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3022881591/ Google Street view recently: maps.google.com.au/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&... Queen Victoria has moved and turned 90 degrees to face down Macquarie St.!

comment.author: 37426109@N07
comment._content: Roundabouts have been around for years so it seems....shame this roundabout no longer exists. That area is now all filled in.

comment._content: This 1905 Sydney Mail item on a rally of unemployed workers at QV's statue has a reverse view...the item is on p. 1557 (I couldn't get a link to p. 1557) - news.google.com/newspapers?id=elZVAAAAIBAJ&sjid=LJUDA...
